thread.title: Kathy
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Kathy

author: Kathy
title: Kathy
text: This was my first experience using R&G. I will not go to no other place for now on. I am very pleased at the quality and experience of this place. Marie was a pleasure to work with and so pleasent. She even let me go home to get prior paperwork and come right back with no wait. I will definately refer people to this place with no doubt.
